reviews.text:
Excellent happy hour and great bar service! Just love Jeff! 

As always the food is fresh and has great flavor.

Great neighborhood gem!

The food is marginal at best. The drinks rely heavily on Watershed product-not our favorite and there was an up charge to get a London Dry Gin (Beefeater)....

Their Arancini makes this place worth it. Just wish there was a touch more salt to it to really bring out the cheesiness of it.
